response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would significantly enhance your operations and add substantial value to your business. Given its high quality and unique features, we understand its worth to you is approximately $1,000,000. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving compared to the market value. We are confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways for your business. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
